#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
long long convert();
char str[20];
int main()
{
	long long n,t,p;
	int i,flag;
	
	while(1)
	{
		i=0;
		t=0;
		flag = 1;
		cin >> str;
		if(str[0] == '#')
			break;
		n = convert();
		if(n >= 9)
			t = t + 9*pow(10,i);
		else
			t = n;
		i++;
		n = n-t;
		while(n)
		{
			p = 9*pow(10,i);
			if(n >= (p*(i+1)))
			{
				t = t + p;
				n = n-(p*(i+1));
			}
			else 
			{
				if(n == (n/(i+1))*(i+1))
				{
					t = t + n/(i+1);
					n = 0;
				}
				else
				{
					flag = 0;
					break;
				}
			}
			i++;
		}
		if(flag)
			cout << t << endl;
		else 
		cout << "Impossible!" << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
long long convert()
{
	int i=0;
	long long n = 0;
	while(str[i] != '\0')
	{
		n = n*10;
		n = n + (str[i] - '0');
		i++;
	}
	return n;
}
